mapper.select: SELECT * FROM good WHERE shop = #{shopName} AND name = #{name};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO good (id, name, description, price, shop) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{shop});
mapper.select: SELECT g.name AS name, g.price AS price, SUM(gt.amount) AS amount FROM good g LEFT JOIN good_transaction gt ON g.id = gt.good_id WHERE g.shop = #{shopName} AND gt.order_id IS NULL GROUP BY g.name, g.price;
